snippet.title: Super Soccer Blast Trailer
snippet.description:
Super Soccer Blast is an arcade style soccer game that tackles the sport in a light-hearted and accessible way.

With its not-too-serious, cartoonish aesthetics and modern approach to classic gameplay, Super Soccer Blast brings back memories of cult classic games like International Superstar Soccer. A super fast, dynamic experience for people who are weary of football managers or complicated hardcore simulators.

You can test your skills in different leagues and cups, play with up to 4 others on local mutiplayer and customize every aspect of your player with an extensive editor. 

Super Soccer Blast from Unfinished Pixel will kickoff on June 12th 2020 on Xbox One and PS4 followed by Nintendo Switch and PC by the end of June 2020. The game is already available to wishlist on Steam.
